Local time in Madrid

The time in Madrid is 2 hours ahead of UTC and the same as in Frankfurt am Main. The current timezone in Madrid is Central European Summer Time (CEST). Madrid is currently observing Daylight Saving Time (DST) also known as summer time. Daylight Saving Time in Madrid ends at Oct. 27, 2024.
